name: Burger Master Hit
description:
Cooking fever is everywhere and we need a craze chief on our kitchen! Many a burger is needed to be made, so sharpen your knife and get ready to cut some ingredients into burgers. Some craze vegetables and fruits are floating above and your target to cut them. Throw your knife in those ingredients to send them into burgers. Throw your knife and cut as many vegetables and fruits as you can, when you cut them, you will see how vegetables, buns and fruits, lol, what are they doing there, will become burger. Be accurate, as if you miss, you will lose and will have to start the game from the very beginning. Get ready to make some burgers and cut vegetables and, surprisingly, fruits in our craze cooking fever simulator: Burger Master Hit.

In this craze simulator, you will have to throw your knife into ingredients of burgers. Cooking fever is everywhere, so be accurate and do not miss while you are throwing. When you cut ingredients, they will drop into burger. Cut all ingredients of burgers and pass the level. For passing the level you will earn tokens, which you can spend in our in-game store. Buy a new knife, which can be bigger than previous and cut more vegetables and fruits to make more burgers! You have no option to miss. Pass every level in game to become the master of the knife. Only most accurate chief will win in this cooking fever. Cut so many vegetables, buns and fruits, that burgers will be everywhere! Show everyone what real cooking fever is in our craze simulator.

Burger Master Hit is a free to play craze simulator of cooking fever. Sharpen your knife and cut every vegetable, bun or fruit you can see. Those ingredients will be grouped in a shape of some figure, so throw your knife and cut as many ingredients of burger into burgers as you can. Make pieces of buns, vegetables and fruits lay everywhere. Pass every level in the game and earn tokens, which you can spend on new knives. Throw your knife again and again to become the best chief in our craze simulator. Cut vegetables, buns and fruits into burgers to pass levels and earn tokens. Download Burger Master Hit and get ready to take part in cooking fever!
